workflow.name: AI invoice agent
workflow.description:
---

# üìÑ AI Invoice Agent

The **AI Invoice Agent** automates the **invoice creation, email delivery, and status tracking** process for client billing. It ensures invoices are generated, sent professionally, and updated in Google Sheets with minimal manual work.

---

## üîπ How It Works

1. **Trigger**

   * Activated manually (`Execute Workflow`) when you want to process invoices.

2. **Fetch Invoices**

   * Reads client invoice data from a **Google Sheet (Client Invoices)**.

3. **Filter Pending Invoices**

   * Passes through only invoices with `Status = Pending`.

4. **Prepare Invoice Data**

   * Collects and formats details:

     * Invoice ID
     * Client Name & Address
     * Project Name
     * Amount (USD)
     * Invoice Date (today‚Äôs date)
     * Due Date (7 days later)

5. **Loop Over Invoices**

   * Processes each invoice **one by one**.

6. **AI Email Draft**

   * Uses **GPT-4.1-mini** to generate a **polite, professional email**.
   * Tone: friendly but business-oriented.
   * Signed as **Upward Engine Team**.

7. **Extract Email Parts**

   * Separates **subject** and **body** from the AI output using an **Information Extractor**.

8. **Generate Invoice PDF**

   * Uses **CraftMyPDF** to create a formatted **invoice PDF** with:

     * Company details (Upward Engine)
     * Client details
     * Invoice ID, Date, Due Date
     * Amount due
     * Footer message

9. **Send Email to Client**

   * Sends invoice email via **Gmail**, attaching the **PDF invoice**.

10. **Update Invoice Status**

    * Updates **Google Sheets** to mark the invoice as **Completed**.
    * Saves Invoice ID, Date, Due Date, and updated status.

11. **Loop Continuation**

    * Continues until all pending invoices are processed.

---

## üîπ Tools & Integrations

* **Google Sheets** ‚Üí Stores client & invoice data
* **Filter Node** ‚Üí Selects only `Pending` invoices
* **GPT-4.1-mini (OpenAI)** ‚Üí Generates professional emails
* **Information Extractor** ‚Üí Separates subject & body
* **CraftMyPDF** ‚Üí Creates PDF invoices
* **Gmail** ‚Üí Sends invoice emails with PDF attachments

---

## üîπ Example Workflow

‚úÖ **Google Sheets:** Invoice marked as `Pending`
‚û°Ô∏è AI generates email ‚Üí ‚ÄúInvoice INV-1023 for Web Design Project ‚Äì Due Sep 5‚Äù
‚û°Ô∏è PDF invoice created & attached
‚û°Ô∏è Email sent to client with subject + body
‚û°Ô∏è Status updated in Google Sheet ‚Üí `Completed`

---

‚ö° This agent ensures **zero missed invoices**, **professional client communication**, and **up-to-date tracking** ‚Äî fully automated for agencies and small businesses.

---

    "invoice_no": "{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['	Invoice ID'] }}",
    "invoice_date": "{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Invoice Date'] }}",
    "invoice_due_date": "{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Due Date'] }}",
    "footer": "Thank you for working with Upward Engine",
    "balance": "{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Amount (USD)'] }}",

    "currency": "$"

}

parameters.content:
‚úÖ Make sure **CraftMyPDF** node is installed in your n8n otherwise it will show error. If first time it doesn't shows the **CraftMyPDF** node then install it then delete the complete workflow and reuse/reupload the workflow again:

---

# üõ† Setup Guide

Follow these steps to get started:

1. **Prepare your Google Sheet**

   * Connect your **Client Invoices** sheet in the **Google Sheets** node.
   * Make sure the sheet has columns like: *Invoice ID, Client Name, Client Email, Client Address, Project Name, Amount (USD), Status, Invoice Date, Due Date*.
   * This sheet will store invoice data and track payment status.

2. **Filter pending invoices**

   * The **Filter** node only processes rows where `Status = Pending`.
   * Update invoice data accordingly before running the workflow.

3. **Edit invoice fields**

   * The **Edit Fields** node automatically sets the `Invoice Date` to today and calculates a `Due Date` (7 days later).
   * It also maps client info and project details from the sheet.

4. **Generate the client email draft**

   * The **AI Agent** creates a polite, professional email using your invoice details.
   * The **Information Extractor** separates the subject and body for structured email sending.

5. **Create the invoice PDF**

   * Connect your [CraftMyPDF](https://craftmypdf.com/) account and replace `YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID` with your template.
   * The invoice includes company info, client details, project name, invoice amount, and payment due date.

6. **Send the invoice email**

   * Connect your **Gmail** account in the **Gmail** node.
   * It sends the AI-generated email with the invoice PDF attached to the client‚Äôs email.

7. **Update invoice status in Google Sheets**

   * After sending, the **Google Sheets1** node updates the row by marking the invoice `Status` as **Completed** along with invoice and due dates.

Once set up, this workflow will **automatically generate invoices, send them via email with PDFs attached, and update your sheet** üì©üìä

---

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
